item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Duffy's Tavern in West Haven


Duffy's is a great little Irish Pub located right on Campbell Ave. I've been a few times after class and I've always had a great time. Chris the owner has been gracious enough to offer the follwing specials for the NHC:

Martinis - $5
Import Drafts - $3.50
Domestic Drafts - $2.50
Well Drinks - $4

There will also be a complimentary offering of some of Duffy's yummy food:
Buffalo Wings
Sweedish Meatballs
Chips and Salsa/Dip


Your contact for this event is:
Jeanie: 203-494-3518

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Duffy's Tavern
